resources.string: Get you dinner delivered to your home between 5pm and 11pm. Our 5 star kitchen offers the following choices.
Select Time You Want Your Delivery
Slow roasted SnakeRiver Farms Kobe Style Beef, roasted root vegetables, mashed potatoes, bordelaise sauce
Kobe beef SnakeRiver Farms frank smothered with caramelized onions and applewood smoked bacon on a grilled house made brioche bun served with fries
